name: Dragon's Lair 2: Time Warp
description: Princess Daphne has been spirited away to a wrinkle in time by the Evil Wizard Mordroc who plans to force her into marriage. Only you, Dirk the Daring, can save her.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: 1.8 GHz dual core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB GeForce 8800, Radeon 3850, or Intel HD 2000 Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i Series Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB GeForce 220, Radeon 4550, Intel HD 3000 Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

reviews.review_text: Though not as influeantial as it's predeccessor, Dragon's Lair 2 was still pretty popular. It's defenitly more frustrating than the first game, but still enjoyable. Don Bluth's animation has never looked better than with this HD version, and the addition of unlimited lives is a much needed improvement. If you're a die hard fan like me, it's still worth getting.
BRO 420 blaze it, then play this game huehue
